PUBLIC SAFETY COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~

Tuesday, January 19, 2021

5:00 PM

Remote Meeting

The Public Safety Committee and the Human Services & Veterans Committee will meet to hear
from community experts on possible ways to design a community-centered public safety response
service.
Attendee Name
Dennis J. Carlone
Alanna Mallon
